mapper.insert: insert into MEET_PRTCP (mtid, prtcp_id, name, gender, phone, email) values (#{mtid}, #{prtcp_id}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{email})
mapper.delete: delete from MEET_PRTCP where mtid = #{ mtid } and prtcp_id = #{id}
mapper.select: select count(prtcp_id) from MEET_PRTCP where prtcp_id = #{prtcp_id}
select count(*) from MEET_PRTCP where mtid = #{mtid}
